definitions.usage_note: 不可数名词。指物质被完全浸泡或充满的状态。

sentences.en: The saturation of the sponge with water made it heavy and dripping.
sentences.zh: 海绵吸水饱和后变得沉重并滴着水。

sentences.en: The fabric reached saturation after being left in the dye for several hours.
sentences.zh: 布料在染料中浸泡数小时后达到饱和。

sentences.en: Rainfall led to the saturation of the soil, causing minor flooding.
sentences.zh: 降雨使土壤饱和，导致轻微积水。

sentences.en: The market has reached saturation point with similar products.
sentences.zh: 市场上同类产品已到达饱和点。

sentences.en: Water reaches saturation point when it can dissolve no more salt.
sentences.zh: 水无法再溶解更多盐时即达到饱和点。

sentences.en: Market saturation in smartphones has slowed industry growth.
sentences.zh: 智能手机市场饱和已减缓行业增长。

sentences.en: The company expanded overseas to avoid market saturation at home.
sentences.zh: 该公司向海外扩张以避开国内市场的饱和。

sentences.en: Adjust the color saturation to make the image more vivid.
sentences.zh: 调整色彩饱和度使图片更鲜艳。

sentences.en: The patient's oxygen saturation dropped below 90%.
sentences.zh: 患者的血氧饱和度降至90%以下。

fullness.diffs: fullness 较口语，侧重“满”的感觉；saturation 更 technical，尤指化学或物理上的饱和。

sentences.en: The fullness of the reservoir indicated a wet season.
sentences.zh: 水库的蓄满说明这是一个多雨季节。

concentration.diffs: concentration 强调溶质含量；saturation 强调已达最大溶解量、不能再增。

sentences.en: High concentration of pollutants was found in the river.
sentences.zh: 河流中发现高浓度污染物。

intensity.diffs: intensity 常用于光、色、情感的强度；saturation 特指色彩饱满程度或市场饱和。

sentences.en: The intensity of the light hurt his eyes.
sentences.zh: 光线的强度刺伤了他的眼睛。

unsaturation.diffs: 化学上指未达最大浓度或化合键未饱和；saturation 与之相反。

sentences.en: Unsaturation in fats is associated with heart health.
sentences.zh: 脂肪的不饱和与心脏健康有关。

dilution.diffs: dilution 指浓度降低；saturation 指浓度已达最高。

sentences.en: Dilution of the acid made it safer to handle.
sentences.zh: 酸的稀释使其更安全易操作。

etymology.origin: 源自拉丁语 saturāre（填满、使饱和），经法语 saturation 传入英语。
affixes: -ation（名词后缀，表状态或动作结果）

sentences.en: Heavy rain saturated the ground overnight.
sentences.zh: 大雨一夜之间浸透了土地。

saturated.rule: saturate 的过去分词作形容词

sentences.en: Saturated fats are found in butter and cheese.
sentences.zh: 饱和脂肪存在于黄油和奶酪中。

sentences.en: Olive oil contains unsaturated fatty acids.
sentences.zh: 橄榄油含有不饱和脂肪酸。

common_mistakes.correct: market saturation / saturation of the market
common_mistakes.explain: “市场饱和”通常说 market saturation；若用 of 结构，the 不可省略。

mnemonics.content: satur-（饱、满）+ -ation → 达到“饱”的状态 → 饱和；浸透。
